posts.post_content: Absolutely love this thing. It's green/white, which means mana ramp shouldn't be an issue, and you can get this thing out and equipped quickly. I use this in almost every deck that runs these colors; most effective in my wolf deck :-) Make a 4/4 Voja token, equip this, and swing. I gain 6 life, possibly kill a creature, hit the opponent, or worst case, have to make another token.
